title: More efficient disk sorting logic needed for border row values
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Sort a dataset containing 40000 rows on disk 
2. Set the program to process the data less than 40000 
3. Observe that the program performs the following operations: 
     a. Saves the file as a temporary file 
     b. Calls the file to memory 
     c. Performs the sorting on the data 
     d. Saves the file to a temporary file
